sqlMap.select:
select
from SF_CHARGE where 1=1
ENTRUST_ID=#dattr1#
ENTRUST_ID=#dattr5#
SF_CHARGE.ND = #nd#
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor=#executor# and instance_id = SF_CHARGE.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor=#executor# and instance_id = SF_CHARGE.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor =#executor# and instance_id = SF_CHARGE.process_inst_id) and SF_CHARGE.STATUS!= 'cancel' and SF_CHARGE.STATUS != 'exec'
( exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=SF_CHARGE.process_inst_id) or SF_CHARGE.process_inst_id = -1 ) and SF_CHARGE.STATUS ='0'
(SF_CHARGE.STATUS='exec')
1=1
order by SF_CHARGE.CHARGE_ID desc
